I want to ask networking experts here: Is there a possibility that our problem with SSH is related to unstable time zone problems, rather than speculations of MITM-attacks or deep packet inspection?

EDIT: it is actually DPI, see comments :S

أوصيكم و نفسى بمراجعة كل الsnapshots بتاعتكم اللى على DigitalOcean قبل فوات الأوان

"Starting October 1, 2016, we will begin charging for snapshot storage at $0.05 per gigabyte per month. This will first be reflected in the invoice posted to your account on November 1, 2016. Like other features, snapshot storage uses hourly pricing, and size is calculated from a compressed version of the snapshot—not the total disk space allocated to the Droplet."

posts.description: Filters are a great, often underutilized feature of ASP.NET MVC and ASP.NET Core MVC. posts.description:
Sign ups are now open for the first round of our CRYENGINE Indie Development Fund. Working on a promising indie game but lack the funding? Apply now for your chance at a grant! Or you can vote for any of the candidates- take a look of our current top three games below!

Sign up now: http://bit.ly/CEFund1
